You could try Gatorade or Sprite. Your electrolytes may be out of wack! Sometimes when you salt intake is too much it'll make you thirsty and excessive water intake only makes it worse.

Then walk to the nearest gas station,  most are 24 hours,  go find a water fountain, ask a friend of they have something to drink. My dorm had vending machines.  Maybe next time invest in a water bottle with a filter so you can drink the tap water.  Or get a ride from someone and buy a case or 2 of water.  Where there's a will there's a way.
